name: Ceramic Art
about: Ceramic art is art made from ceramic materials (including clay), which may take forms such as pottery, tile, figurines, sculpture, and tableware.

name: Conceptual Art
about: Conceptual art, also referred to as conceptualism, is art in which the concept's or idea's involved in the work take precedence over traditional aesthetic, technical, and material concerns.

name: Drawing
about: Drawing is a form of visual art in which an artist uses instruments to mark paper or other two-dimensional surface.

name: Painting
about: Painting is the practice of applying paint, pigment, color or other medium to a solid surface.

name: Car Art
about: An art car is a vehicle that has had its appearance modified as an act of personal artistic expression.

name: 3D Art
about: Creating 3D art takes a great deal of skill, but if you're willing to put in the effort then you can achieve stunning results.

name: Home Art & Design
about: At Home Art & Design, we offer a full range of interior design services from room planning to fabric sourcing and decoration.
